modules.title: Understanding NFTs
modules.description: Learn the fundamentals of Non-Fungible Tokens

lessons.title: What are NFTs?
lessons.content:
NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) are unique digital assets that represent ownership of a specific item or piece of content on the blockchain.

**Key Characteristics:**
â€¢ **Unique**: Each NFT has distinct properties
â€¢ **Indivisible**: Cannot be split into smaller parts
â€¢ **Verifiable**: Ownership is proven on the blockchain
â€¢ **Immutable**: Cannot be altered once created

**Common Use Cases:**
â€¢ Digital art and collectibles
â€¢ Gaming items and characters
â€¢ Virtual real estate
â€¢ Music and video content
â€¢ Domain names and identities

**Why NFTs Matter**:
NFTs enable true digital ownership and create new economic models for creators and collectors.

lessons.title: How NFTs Work
lessons.content:
**Blockchain Technology**:
NFTs are built on blockchain technology, which provides:
â€¢ Decentralized ownership records
â€¢ Immutable transaction history
â€¢ Global accessibility

**Smart Contracts**:
NFTs are governed by smart contracts that define:
â€¢ Token standards (ERC-721, ERC-1155)
â€¢ Ownership rules
â€¢ Transfer mechanisms
â€¢ Metadata storage

**Metadata**:
Each NFT contains metadata that describes:
â€¢ The digital asset it represents
â€¢ Creator information
â€¢ Properties and attributes
â€¢ Links to external content

**Gas Fees**:
Creating and trading NFTs requires gas fees to pay for blockchain transactions.

lessons.title: Preparing Your Digital Asset
lessons.content:

â€¢ File size limits (varies by platform)

**Metadata Preparation**:

â€¢ Description explaining the piece
â€¢ Properties/attributes (rarity traits)
â€¢ External links (website, social media)

**Legal Considerations**:
â€¢ Ensure you own the rights to the content
â€¢ Consider licensing terms
â€¢ Be aware of copyright issues

**Market Research**:
â€¢ Study successful NFT collections
â€¢ Understand current trends
â€¢ Research target audience
